title: What to Read This Week
sub_head: Churchill and Roosevelt’s fateful meeting at sea, Vikings in America, Colm Tóibín imagines Thomas Mann’s secrets, Inspector Gamache returns and more.
body:
Two books look at the pivotal 1941 shipboard meeting and its impact today. Review by Paul Kennedy
Read the review
Horned helmets, longships and long poems? The Vikings were much more than the clichés. Review by Tunku Varadarajan
Read the review
